text: Jissen Gakuen Junior & Senior High School is a combined junior and high school in Tokyo. This school is also a co-educational school, but there are more boys than girls: 601 boys and 454 girls so a total of 1055 students. In April 2020, there are four courses that academic-track, standard, sports, and liberal & science course. Category:High schools in Japan Category:Buildings and structures in Tokyo
title: Jissen Gakuen High School
